p: The dry matter content, Si content and carbon and nitrogen metabolites in the roots of G. uralensis were analyzed by SPSS path analysis. The independent variables were set as follows: Y 1: dry matter mass per plant (g), X 1: Si content in root, X 2: total sugar and X 3: total nitrogen. The stepwise regression equation and partial correlation coefficient are as follows: Y 1 = 0.328X 1 + 0.029X 2 + 2.742X 3 + 1.062, F = 39.434. The direct and indirect effects of the above factors on yield were obtained by path analysis with dry matter per plant of licorice, as shown in Tables 2, 3 and 4:
